intro: Mondia ecornuta, commonly known as the hornless mondia, is a flowering plant native to tropical Africa. It belongs to the family Violaceae and is characterized by its erect, branched stems and opposite, ovate leaves. Mondia ecornuta is often found in moist, shaded habitats and is used in traditional medicine for its purported health benefits.
